duties_responsibilities.duty: Participating in customer engagements presenting various Verizon and partner technologies such as wireless networking, edge computing, AR/VR, computervision, robotics, IoT, Industry 4.0, and more.
Collaborating with the Lab team and internal stakeholders to onboard new technology demonstrations and integrate them into the overall experience.
Maintaining and refining select demo talk tracks to stay current with technology and messaging.
Working with internal and external ecosystem partners to support and troubleshoot technology pilots and PoC's.
Supporting the day-to-day operations and upkeep of the technology demonstration portfolio at the Lab.
Researching the customers scheduled to come to the lab to help ensure the delivery of a tailored and productive experience.
Capturing and curating voice of the customer insights from lab engagements.
Identifying areas for process improvements, making recommendations, and executing on enhancements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience (Master's preferred)
